title: Waistcoat, 1750–70
medium:
Medium: silk, metal-wrapped threads with silk core, metallic sequins
Technique: Four metallic gold yarns couched on silk plain weave moiré; sequins sewn on; couching has been done over paper padding
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Metallic gold threads and sequins embroidered on pink moiré foundation.

tombstone.epitaph:
Waistcoat, 1750–70.
1750–70. Medium: silk, metal-wrapped threads with silk core, metallic sequins
Technique: Four metallic gold yarns couched on silk plain weave moiré; sequins sewn on; couching has been done over paper padding. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-54-3-a,b.
